Danya Lette

Software Developer

About

Hi, I'm Danya Lette. I'm a developer living and working in Toronto. I love learning and building cool stuff.

During my undergrad, I studied Philosophy, and a bit of Math and Physics. My drive to create led me towards technology.

My interests, projects, and tools are quite varied and always changing. I particularly like working with data. I enjoy data visualization, creating interactive UIs for viewing and manipulating data, and designing software that accommodates complex business logic.

Toolkit

Javascript, ES6, Webpack, Gulp, Grunt, React, Angular, Ajax, CSS, SCSS, Less, HTML, SVG, Web Audio, Canvas, Paper, ThreeJS, Python, Django, Django Rest Framework, Cordova, Ionic, Git, RegEx, Linux, Apache, Nginx, Arduino.
